bike.description: C5 carbon w/ aero shaped tubes, internal cable routing, EST (extended seat tube), integrated alloy cupped head tube
sizes: XS/S (48cm), S (50cm), S/M (52cm), M (54cm), M/L (56cm), L (58cm), XL (60cm)

components.description: C5 carbon aero stays w/ BC (brake cavity) design, cold forged dropout w/replaceable hanger
FC-440 Fuji carbon aero monocoque w/ 1 1/8" carbon steerer w/ internal routing
Shimano SL-BS79 Bar End TT shifters, 20-speed
Oval 327 aero alloy clincher, 20/24H sealed bearing hubs, stainless bladed spokes
Hutchinson Equinox II, 60 tpi, 700c x 23mm, folding
FSA Orbit CE 1 1/8" integrated w/ alloy top cover
Oval 750 alloy base bar w/ 750 alloy extensions
Oval R500T Triathlon w/ CrMo hollow rails
